import axios from 'axios' import React, {usestate,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link,useParams} from 'react-router-dom' var idno; export default(props)=> { var [userData,setStateUserData] =usestate = ({ id:'', name:'', email:'', phone:'' }); let {idno} =useParams(); let {id,name,email,phone} =userData; useEffect(()=>{ const url =`https://localhost:3001/users/${idno}` axios.get(url).then((result)=> setStateUserData(result.data))},[]); return(<>

VIEW COMPONENT PAGE

{idno}th Record Data

  • {this.state.id}
  • {this.state.name}
  • {this.state.phone}
  • {this.state.email}
GO BACK
) }
